definitions.definition: Damage to the body of a living thing.
examples: The passenger sustained a severe injury in the car accident.

definitions.definition: Other forms of damage sustained by a living thing, e.g. psychologically.
The violation of a person's reputation, rights, property, or interests.
examples: Slander is an injury to the character.

main_definition: Damage to the body of a living thing.
secondary_definitions: Other forms of damage sustained by a living thing, e.g. psychologically.
The violation of a person's reputation, rights, property, or interests.
